rules.name: anvilColorFormatting
rules.description: Allows the use of spigot formatting inside of anvils
extras: Enable and use the /colors command to see formatting codes you can use
Based on code by Super-Santa, from FX's WeirdAddons

rules.name: capIgnoresDeathAnimation
rules.description: Mobs in death animation do not count towards the mob cap

rules.name: chunkRegenFix
rules.description: Fixes Chunk Regen due to NbtString writeUTF() not respecting readUTF() Limits

rules.name: commandColors
extras: Use this command to see formatting codes you can use
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: creativeOneHitKill
rules.description: Allows players in Creative mode to kill entities in one hit
extras: If the player is sneaking, other entities around the target get killed too

rules.name: dispensersShootTridents
extras: I know bedrock has this too, but we don't talk about bedrock

rules.name: drownedUseEnchantedTridents
rules.description: Allows tridents thrown by drowned to use the enchantments on the trident held by said drowned

rules.name: filterBotsInScores
rules.description: Bots don't appear on scoreboards and do not count in the total if they're not in a team
extras: Normal players need to be in a team!

rules.name: forceLoadEnderPearls
rules.description: Prevents ender pearls from getting deleted when they move into unloaded chunks
extras: This also means that ender pearls load chunks
Merged with keepEnderPearlsTicked from carpet-addons by whoImT

rules.name: impalingAffectsMobsInWater
rules.description: Backports applying the Impaling enchantment on any mob that is in water or rain

rules.name: maxHostileSpawnLightLevel
rules.description: Adjusts the maximum light level general hostile mobs can spawn in
extras: At maxHostileSpawnLightLevel <= 7, only maximum block light level is modified without changing the light level spawning chances, emulating mob spawning chances from 1.17.1 and below

At every subsequent value maxHostileSpawnLightLevel > 7, the upper bound for the random integer generator is increased to accommodate for higher light levels, modifying the mob spawning chances at light levels > 0 and <= 7
validators: You must choose a light level from 0 to 15

rules.name: phantomsCapped
rules.description: Prevents phantoms from spawning if mobcap is full

rules.name: teleportToPoiWithoutPortals
rules.description: Re-adds teleporting to portal POIs without portal blocks

rules.name: totalScore
rules.description: The scoreboard total appears on the scoreboard

rules.name: voidedLoyaltyTridentsReturn
rules.description: Backports returning Loyalty tridents to their owner when thrown into the void
